# Control Statements

Control statements help determine the flow and execution of commands based on
conditional statements. This chapter will cover a brief overview of the
following:

- Conditional Statements
  * if / if-else / ifelse
  * switch

- Loops
  * for
  * while
  * repeat

- Special
  * return
  * break
  * next

- Other
  * try / tryCatch
  * nested
